original_text: I am not as strong as stones. My body is not strong like bronze. I am not as strong as stones. My body is not strong like bronze. I am not as strong as stones.
korean_text: 나의 기력이 어찌 돌의 기력이겠느냐 나의 살이 어찌 놋쇠겠느냐

sentences.original_text: I am not as strong as stones.
My body is not strong like bronze.
I am not as strong as stones.
My body is not strong like bronze.
